summary:
I’m a marketer with a passion for building brands. Working on products that can make a positive impact on people’s lives drives me, with a record of delivering effective marketing that can shift business metrics and perspectives.  

From launching the first fully electric ride-hail service in the UK, to creative and data-led strategies for brands like Uber and Philips, I have more than 10 years experience in marketing communications across brand marketing, social, communications and digital.

Campaign lead for Uber's first global commitments to sustainability, announcing focus on electric vehicles across European capitals for 2025, and 2040 goal to be a zero emissions platform 
• Marketing lead for launch of Uber Green in the UK, the first electric-only ride-hailing service in the country. Devised and implemented an owned channel communications strategy for customers and drivers, growing product usage month on month and increasing brand metrics 
• Lead for Uber's first ATL Sustainability campaign in EMEA, owning strategy, creative development and roll out across France and the UK for brand and message consistency

Monthly analysis and feedback led to improved sentiment and engagement across the region
• Stepped up to regional social lead, reporting into EMEA Head of Marketing 
• Social program lead for Safety Never Stops. Oversaw social strategy, creative, deployment and measurement across 30+ markets, contributing to the most effective increase in brand metrics of any brand campaign in the region
• Devised a new social agency model, management process and on boarding following a complete Marketing reorganisation centralising responsibilities 
• Connected social media to business objectives, establishing Quarterly brand lift studies showing QoQ uplift.', 'title': 'Sr Social Media Content Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1090, 'name': 'Philips', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQG4O5wCG6zf2Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855869410?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=lwbs3fZHITA_Bs1N2t36YOUxeHQkcuA8pCYt7ENTexk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/philips/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': '• Oversaw global social media strategy, tooling, production, measurement and network management for channels exceeding 10 million followers
• Established a global content strategy and calendar for Philips accounts, generating consistency and cost savings across 20+ markets and lines of business 
• Executive level engagement leading Facebook Quarterly Business Reviews, aligning strategic priorities with media spend 
• Project owner for the consolidation of media buying on social media into one tool across media arms in 16 markets and 11 Business Groups. Enabled global performance transparency and optimization for the first time on the channel for eight-figure annual spend
• Lead for creative brand partnership projects including the Art of Health, together with the Rijksmuseum 
• Pitched and led testing of social media as channel for consumer registration, generating six-figure impact.', 'title': 'Senior Global Social Media Strategist', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': '• Built a consistent creative platform and visual identity for Philips global, supporting our consumer business strategy, while significantly increasing engagement

• Social strategy lead for at key product launch and cultural moments including IFA and SXSW, driving significant earned media coverage and engagement 
• Personally oversaw community management for Philips global channels, managing variously Facebook, Instagram, YouTube and Google+ (yep, those days)
• Grew Philips’s global Instagram presence organically over 10X.', 'title': 'Global Social Media & Communications Manager', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': '• Editor in chief for Philips consumer division intranet and employee magazine
